BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #23603 from containers/renovate/github.com-docker-docker-27.x Update module github.com/docker/docker to v27.1.2+incompatible

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix known_hosts file clogging and remote host id By enabling UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null, and CheckHostIP=no options to the defaults we prevent the user from adding the host key multiple times and from flakes that can raise Remote Host Id change. Resolves: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/23505 Signed-off-by: Nicola Sella <nsella@redhat.com>
